snippet: The sport of kite boarding, is still in its infancy, having had its first world championship only three years ago, but will be an Olympic sport in 2016.
abstract: International Sailing Federation, windsurfing's global governing body, votes to drop windsurfing as an Olympic sport for the 2016 Summer Games in Rio de Janeiro and replace it with kitesurfing, or kiteboarding as it is also known.
lead_paragraph: The sport of kite boarding, is still in its infancy, having had its first world championship only three years ago, but will be an Olympic sport in 2016.

headline.seo: Kite Boarding Is Ready for Olympic Takeoff
headline.main: The Wind, the Waves, the Water: Kite Boarding Is Ready for Takeoff
headline.print_headline: The Wind, the Waves, the Water: Kite Boarding Is Ready for Takeoff
